content: create these quick and easy crochet pumpkins for fall decorating perfect for last-minute projects they work up fast and add a cozy handmade touch to your home includes a free pattern video tutorial and an ad-free pdf option handmade pumpkins add a special touch to any space and they re just as fun to gift as they are to make share a few with friends tuck them into a fall gift basket or surprise someone with a cozy autumn decoration made by you **unique features-** beginner-friendly pattern for all skill levels two size options for versatile decorating written instructions and video tutorial for easy crafting quick project using super bulky yarn charming addition to fall decor **materials needed-** hooks 6 5mm us size 10 5 9mm us size 13 0 yarn wool ease thick & quick super bulky weight 45-60 yards gauge 12 stitches by 11 row = 4 inches **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** **♥** rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
